price: 15. « Que non, dit (le Seigneur), partez tous deux munis de Nos Signes. Nous sommes avec vous et Nous écoutons.
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
